title: Owner of a club, but it doesn't show up for me
body:
Hi, 
I made a club a while back but it no longer shows up on my account. My friends say I'm still in it but it's like it's disappeared from my end. Anybody know what's up?

replies.body: That should be easy enough for me to fix up! Hit me back up with the name of that club or the tag, and I can give it a little nudge so that you can see it again.
Crap, didn't realize you'd replied; hopefully it's not too late! The tag should be HEREN
Would I be able to request similar help? Same situation: owner of the club but it doesn't show, and my friends say I'm still in it.
